## foldback variable

Recursively folds input into `[-thresh .. +thresh]` interval and amplifies it with `amp` (default: 1/thresh).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
foldback: (thresh?: number | undefined, amp?: number | undefined) => Foldback
```

## Remarks

Reference: - https://www.desmos.com/calculator/lkyf2ag3ta
